Mathtest

Posted on August 14, 2015 by Andrew Pantuso
Tags: Math

Here is an example of \(\LaTeX\) using Markdown. \[ \ln x = \int_{-\infty}^x \frac 1 y \, dy . \]

Hopefully that worked.
